The Artist

I'm a Lead Character Artist crafting memorable characters for games, collectibles, and interactive experiences.

I blend technical precision with artistic intuition, transforming concepts into sculpted, game-ready assets that breathe life into virtual worlds.

My work spans from stylized creatures to realistic heroes. I've shipped titles with studios worldwide, delivering characters that perform in-engine while standing as sculptures.
